decision_conditions:
<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and docume<span style="font-size: 14px;">nts:&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">FARA9 PL-A-01, FARA9 PL-A-02, DESIGN&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">AND ACCESS STATEMENT (kbd
building designs), Form 4 â€“ Reasonable Exception Statement, CIL Form 1</span></p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows /doors shall be installed in the flank elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Conversion of garage to habitable room, Replacement of garage door with windows in front elevation, Alterations to garage roof to a dual pitched roof and increase in the height of the side extension, Single storey rear extension, Raised decking to rear (Demolition of rear conservatory)
